name: Greed of Man
summary: Greed of Man is an open world multiplayer game where you live in a town built and ran by real players. Players can buy and own their own Houses that they can decorate as they wish. There is an in game economy also influenced by players. Players can choose to start their own jobs and run their own legal businesses like shops and factories, but they can also get a little more spicy with their money by constructing underground black market business like drug and weapons cratering. And not only can players purchase properties but they can also build one, or hire a construction company to build one. You can also rob other peoples business, but be aware of players playing as cops as they can always stop you in your conquest of crime.
